name: Chicken Biryani
description: Aromatic rice dish with tender chicken, fragrant spices, and saffron. A royal dish that's perfect for special occasions.
ingredients: 1/4 tsp saffron soaked in 1/4 cup warm milk
instructions: Soak basmati rice for 30 minutes, then drain.
Marinate chicken with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, red chili powder, turmeric, and salt for 30 minutes.
Heat ghee in a heavy-bottomed pot and fry sliced onions until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
In the same pot, add marinated chicken and cook until 80% done (about 15 minutes).
Boil water with whole spices and salt. Add rice and cook until 70% done. Drain.
Layer the partially cooked rice over chicken. Sprinkle fried onions, mint, coriander, and saffron milk.
Cover with aluminum foil, then place the lid. Cook on high heat for 3 minutes, then reduce to low heat for 45 minutes.
Turn off heat and let it rest for 10 minutes before opening. Gently mix and serve hot.
text: Chicken Biryani is a aromatic rice dish with tender chicken, fragrant spices, and saffron. A royal dish that's perfect for special occasions.

name: Pad Thai
description: Thailand's most famous noodle dish with sweet, sour, and salty flavors perfectly balanced with tender shrimp and crunchy peanuts.
ingredients: 2 tbsp palm sugar or brown sugar
instructions: Soak rice noodles in warm water until soft, about 30 minutes. Drain and set aside.
Mix tamarind paste, fish sauce, and palm sugar in a small bowl to make the sauce.
Heat oil in a large wok or skillet over high heat. Add garlic and stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add shrimp and cook until pink, about 2 minutes.
Push everything to one side and scramble eggs on the other side.
Add noodles and sauce, toss everything together for 2-3 minutes.
Add bean sprouts and green onions, stir-fry for another minute.
Serve immediately with crushed peanuts, lime wedges, and chili flakes on the side.
text: Pad Thai is Thailand's most famous noodle dish with sweet, sour, and salty flavors perfectly balanced with tender shrimp and crunchy peanuts.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Neapolitan pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil. Simple ingredients that create the perfect harmony of flavors.
ingredients: Extra virgin olive oil for drizzling
instructions: Dissolve yeast in warm water and let sit for 5 minutes until foamy.
Mix flour and salt in a large bowl. Add yeast mixture and olive oil.
Knead dough for 10 minutes until smooth and elastic. Place in oiled bowl.
Cover and let rise for 1 hour until doubled in size.
Preheat oven to highest setting (usually 500째F/260째C) with pizza stone if available.
Divide dough into 4 portions. Roll each into thin circles.
Spread crushed tomatoes thinly, leaving a border for the crust.
Add torn mozzarella and bake for 8-12 minutes until crust is golden.
Remove from oven, add fresh basil, drizzle with olive oil, and season with salt.
text: Margherita Pizza is a classic Neapolitan pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil. Simple ingredients that create the perfect harmony of flavors.

name: Sushi Rolls (California Roll)
description: Popular inside-out sushi roll with cucumber, avocado, and crab meat. Perfect for beginners to Japanese cuisine.
ingredients: Wasabi and pickled ginger for serving
instructions: Rinse sushi rice until water runs clear. Cook with water in rice cooker or pot.
Mix rice vinegar, sugar, and salt. When rice is done, fold in this mixture and cool.
Place nori sheet shiny side down on bamboo mat covered with plastic wrap.
Spread rice evenly over nori, leaving 1-inch border. Sprinkle with sesame seeds.
Flip over so nori is on top. Place cucumber, avocado, and crab in center.
Using the mat, roll tightly from bottom, pressing gently but firmly.
Wet a sharp knife and cut roll into 8 pieces, cleaning knife between cuts.
Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.
text: California Roll sushi with cucumber, avocado, and crab meat. Perfect for beginners to Japanese cuisine.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Authentic Mexican tacos with seasoned ground beef, fresh toppings, and warm tortillas. Street food at its finest.
ingredients: Sour cream and salsa for serving
instructions: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook ground beef until browned.
Add diced onion and garlic, cook until onion is translucent.
Add chili powder, cumin, paprika, oregano, salt, and pepper. Cook for 2 minutes.
Add 1/4 cup water and simmer until liquid evaporates, about 5 minutes.
Warm tortillas in a dry skillet or microwave until soft and pliable.
Fill each tortilla with beef mixture and desired toppings.
Serve immediately with lime wedges, sour cream, and salsa on the side.
text: Beef Tacos are authentic Mexican tacos with seasoned ground beef, fresh toppings, and warm tortillas. Street food at its finest.

name: French Croissants
description: Buttery, flaky pastries that are the pride of French baking. Requires patience but delivers incredible results.
ingredients: 1 egg beaten with 1 tbsp milk for egg wash
instructions: Mix flour, salt, sugar, and yeast. Add cold milk and knead until smooth dough forms.
Wrap dough and refrigerate for 1 hour.
Pound cold butter into a rectangle between parchment paper. Keep cold.
Roll dough into rectangle twice the size of butter. Place butter on half, fold over.
Roll out gently, fold into thirds. Wrap and chill 30 minutes. Repeat 2 more times.
Roll final dough into large rectangle. Cut into triangles.
Roll each triangle from base to tip, curve into crescent shape.
Place on lined baking sheet, proof for 2 hours until doubled.
Brush with egg wash, bake at 400째F (200째C) for 15-20 minutes until golden.
text: French Croissants are buttery, flaky pastries that are the pride of French baking. Requires patience but delivers incredible results.
